title: Sophie Monk poses in candid bikini shoot for beau Joshua Gross
text:
She's made no secret of wearing hair extensions and bleaching her locks to accentuate her natural beauty.

But Sophie Monk stripped back her look as she stripped down to a swimsuit for yet another impromptu bikini shoot, taken by boyfriend Joshua Gross in Fiji over the weekend.

The 39-year-old, who is on the island filming the reality TV show Love Island, removed her extensions and wore minimal makeup in the untouched photographs.

Natural beauty! Sophie Monk removed her hair extensions and wore minimal makeup as she posed in candid bikini shoot taken by her boyfriend Joshua Gross in Fiji over the weekend

She also showed off her incredible figure and glowing tan in a skimpy orange triangle bikini as she splashed around in the crystal clear water.

Sophie, who is not afraid to poke fun at herself, joked about 'reality Vs expectation', posting a picture of herself posing perfectly on the sand before sharing an awkward video of herself falling over in the water while applying lip gloss.

She also joked in the caption that her hair was a 'chemical cut' a result of using bleach to colour her hair.

Feeling hot, hot, hot: Sophie showed off her incredible figure and glowing tan in a skimpy orange triangle bikini

'New hair... It’s called a chemical cut. No extensions. Swipe for a song I recorded no one heard! Swipe again for reality. Photog: My Boyfriend @joshuargross Hair: too much bleach Kini: @tjswim Lipgloss: tickle @mcobeauty by me Skin: @mcobeauty shimmer spray and @solardsunscreen.'

The snaps come after Sophie confirmed she will have a bigger role on Love Island Australia this year, during an interview with OK! magazine.

'[I will be on there] maybe a little more because there are a heap of new twists and turns on this season,' she said.

She also joked in the caption that her hair was a 'chemical cut' a result of using bleach to colour her hair

While her role is more wide-ranging than last year, Love Island Australia will remain focused on the sexy contestants and their 'recoupling' ceremonies.

'The show is all about the boys and girls,' she said. 'I'm the host and I think people are more aware of how Love Island works [now] and what my role is.'

During season one, Sophie left viewers scratching their heads when she only appeared a handful of times.

Some fans even questioned whether Channel Nine executives had spent their money wisely after Sophie signed a rumoured $1 million deal with the network.

In March, former Bardot singer Sophie told HIT 105's Stav, Abby and Matt that she's hoping for a ring from her beau Joshua.

White hot: This isn't the first time Sophie has posed for her beau Joshua, starring in a beach shoot for him just last week

'I said we're going to get married, but he hasn't proposed so I probably should have thought that through and given him a choice in the situation,' she said laughing.

The couple first met on a flight from Europe to Australia last August, and shared a kiss after enjoying 'three champagnes' in business class.

Love Island Australia continues on Channel Nine, Thursday, 8.30pm.
